::FZ/Zardus/Supernova::

FZ walks up to Zardus, both bots already knowing what was going on
through the link that Zardus and his 'clone' had. Zardus looks to
Mortem.

"I have some buisness to take care of. This bot will assist you if you
need."

With that, he walks out of the room, walking to the CR chambers. He
looks at the Galactors as he enters. "Where is he?"

Supernova points to a CR chamber, and Zardus approaches it, waiting
for Wolfgang to repair. The Galactors had, of course, searched the
bot's body for weapons before dumping him into the CR.
